existing_coverage_summary: The client possesses two insurance policies: one Vista investment plan valued at AED 416,136.28 and one FUTURA whole-of-life plan valued at AED 106,445.34. Combined, the total insurance value is AED 522,581.62.
Agent_Recommends: The client currently maintains investment and whole-of-life insurance products. There's potential for more holistic legacy planning and wealth protection services suited to their financial profile and Wealth Management segment needs. Further engagement and review of objectives are suggested.
